root.str: The Heavy Rail Beam can store 50 more rounds
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 96 rockets.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 6 rounds.
Adds 4 rounds to the default magazine size.
Apply this glowing decal to your vehicle.

No longer functional, break down for ISO-4.
Reduces the duration which Concussion and Flash Grenades affect you by 50%.
Adds an image projection to your flashlight. Decals are weapon-specific. All factions can use this gear.
Customize your soldier's voice with this Stalwart Voice Pack. VS Male use only.

While deployed, shares the locations of enemy infantry within 45 meters every 1.5 seconds; the Infiltrator also receives live movement updates of enemies within 20 meters. Lasts 180 seconds, four can be carried.
Error retrieving cards on file, please try again later!
The Octal provides the shooter the ability to maintain a measure of their field of view without sacrificing their effectiveness at longer range.
Allows cortium to be used to create a module that, when powered, renders nearby structures nearly indestructible thanks to lightning-fast repairs. NC use only.
CS Gift: Squad XP Boost - 1 Day
CS Gift: Squad Resource Boost - 7 Day
Additional composite plating to complement the look of your soldier. NC use only.
We're in danger of losing the outpost!
Apply the Snakeskin camo pattern to your weapon. VS use only.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 11 rockets.

<font color="#00FFAA">Warden Hadley:</font> I can't believe the Terran Republic really thought they'd be able to win the war that way. I don't expect much, but the datapad will be delivered to our scientists to see what they can come up with.

<font color="#00FFAA">Facilitator Campner:</font> Scan complete, once again our analysts inform me that Foster was at that location, but is no longer there. They are narrowing in and feel very confident about this next location.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.3 seconds.
Allows Light Assault to use Smoke Grenades.
Adds a bumper to the Harasser. All factions can use this item.
Reduces the acquire timer of the Scythe by 600 seconds.
Earn Sunderer spawn experience while deployed in contested territory.
Secondary weapon mount on the top of the Vanguard's primary turret. Operated by the passenger in seat 2.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 28.
<font color="#00FFAA">Foster:</font> The readings are getting clearer. I've designated another area for you to go to.
Bends light around the infiltrator, resulting in near perfect invisibility while motionless. Cloak lasts for up to 12 seconds, and regenerates to full in 7 seconds.
Step into the teleporter marked by your waypoint.
<font color="#00FFAA">FL-34: </font> Plus, I eavesdrop on communications all the time. You'd be surprised what you learn!

<font color="#00FFAA">Festive Drone:</font> Representative Nalla. Nascent Expeditions representative. In need of power source for an NS-1317X surface-to-orbit communications unit. Rare. Black Market vendor. SPRK-33. May be of assistance.
Killing an enemy while wielding a melee weapon restores 325 health. This effect does not trigger on quick melee attacks.

Collects your haul from the latest Synthium expedition.
Contains 35 Synthium.
<font color="#00FFAA">Foster:</font> The energy signature from this vehicle is quite strange. It seems to be infused with what we're calling "Tempest," the energy permeating Esamir at this time.
Apply this decal to show your battle rank.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 48 grenades.
Allows 2 additional grenades of any type to be carried.
Control the most territory to conquer the continent
Return to an allied Warpgate on any continent.
Upon being revived, damage taken is reduced by 20% for 1.5 seconds. <font color="#dc9c36">MAX units can equip.</font>
Enemy tanks destroyed! Press on to control point A!
This customization adds a Purple decal to the cockpit glass. TR use only.
Nanite Systems' latest project and invasive species, the Space Pumpkin, is taking over! Destroy pumpkins during the Pumpkin Hunt alert and trade in the seeds for rewards.

Created by the neutral Nanite Systems organization, these robotic operatives are controlled remotely and contracted to the highest bidder. An operative can be found fighting under the banner of any of the three empires.

NSO characters are only available to players above Battle Rank 20.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 36 rounds.

Activates a Repair Drone that hovers nearby. Friendly vehicles, equipment, and MAX units within range passively recover health every second. <font color="#dc9c36">Expires at the end of the Campaign.</font>
Applies a camo to your armor, weapon or vehicle. TR use only.
Apply the single use Desert Scrub v1 camo pattern to your weapon. NC use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
Replaces the Sunderer grill with a custom grill.
Members skip to the front of the line!
The invitation to join [*guild*] has been revoked.

Outfit Wars has been completely overhauled with an all new ranking system, match-based qualifiers, and special rewards for brave participants. Think your outfit has what it takes to dominate the asteroid belt of Desolation with a platoon of your best soldiers?

  • Enlist your outfit to compete in the war.
  • Advance through the ranks by winning weekly qualification matches.
  • Claim victory over your enemies, and earn rewards based on your leaderboard placement.


    • More information can be found in the Outfit menu.
Increases the strafe speed of the Magrider by 4 KPH.
Adds 15 rounds to the default magazine size.
Applies a decal to your vehicle. NC use only.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 10 rounds.
Apply this helmet to your MAX. NC use only.
Earn this ribbon by capturing and defending bases with your Outfit. Conquered facilities must have at least 10 enemies present in order to earn credit.
Earn this service ribbon by restoring your allies' shields with the Regeneration Field.
Lightweight, explosion resistant plating increases movement speed and explosion resistance at the expense of less total armor
Unlock mobility boosting Certifications for the Prowler's performance slot. Performance slot items can be equipped on the loadout screen.
Increases maximum Nanite Healing Grenade capacity
Detects the movement of hostile enemies within 200 meters of the vehicle and reveals them on the mini-map for nearby allies. The vehicle must be occupied for scout radar to function.
NSO outfits cannot participate in Outfit Wars at this time.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 1350 rounds.
Improved hover, air brake, and vertical thrust. (More effective than previous rank)
because it is too close to another deployable.

Objective Pool:

Earn heal experience.

Revive fallen allies.

Earn repair experience.

Earn resupply experience

Damage enemy vehicles.

Destroy an enemy vehicle.
Go to the vehicle terminal and spawn a Flash.
A 7x magnitude zoom precision sniper scope.
Capture Trident Relay facilities on Oshur.
Use the Vehicle Terminal to acquire a Sunderer.
Wearable by all non-Max classes. TR use only.
Wearable by all non-Max classes. NC use only.
Press [%s] to speak with expedition coordinator
The Air to Air Missiles are ideal for engaging enemy aircrafts. This weapon does require a lock-on before they can be fired.
Platinum versions of the Underboss, NS-11, NS-15M, available now in the Platinum Pack Bundle!
Victory Point XP (-75% XP Pop Adv)
Applies a special ItZMuRdA decal to your vehicle.
Decreases the time needed to reload weapon by 6.25%
hours have passed since you logged into the game, consider taking a break.

Unlike its Yumi predecessor, the NSX Kuwa will, after a short windup, release a torrent of accurate, high caliber rounds down range until the trigger is released. This weapon is a hybrid rifle, available to Engineer, Combat Medic, and Heavy Assault classes.

Unlocks the Ordnance Dampener for your tactical loadout slot. These are resupplied using Merit points.

Single use consumable. Max 2 between resupplies.
Deploys a dampening field that reduces common explosive damage by 50% for allied infantry and MAX units within range. Only one Ordnance Dampener can be active at a time.
This bundle includes two PlanetSide: Arena themed common pool weapons; one Light Assault Armor available VS, NC, and TR; and one infantry helmet available to all classes.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.12 seconds.
Adds 6 rounds to the default magazine size.
The Illuminated Apex Helmet is based on ancient but effective designs that originated on Earth hundreds of years ago. TR use only.
Additional Lumifiber plating to complement the look of your soldier. TR use only.

Amidst the sprawling battlefields, the insidious sprouting of the SpacePumpkin swarms sow chaos throughout Auraxis!

  • The Halloween Event is in full swing, with some new goodies to see and do.
  • A new Seasonal Directive starts with a visit to Sanctuary and ends with new rewards!
  • Find and destroy SpacePumpkins and the rare Galact-O-Lanterns on each continent.
  • The Depot is filled with limited-time camos, weapons, and cosmetics.
Applies a decal to your armor. NC use only.
Reduces the nanite cost of Lightning and Main Battle Tank by 20%.
Apply the single use Indar Canyons v1 camo pattern to your weapon.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 72 rounds.
Earn this ribbon by making hood ornaments out of your enemies.
Nanites constantly repair damage over time at a rate of 6.67% every 5 seconds. Damage disables auto repair for 12 seconds.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.075 seconds.
Increases the ammo capacity of the weapon to 140 rounds.
There's a MAX unit guarding the control point. This armored exo suit is tougher than standard infantry. Take them out using your rocket launcher or light machine gun.
You are awarded resources for holding territory for the Vanu Sovereignty.

<font color="#00FFAA">Festive Drone:</font> Nascent Expeditions coordinator. Tolland. Interested in acquiring a rare piece of 21st century entertainment recorded on flattened sheets of pulverized biomass. Warden Hadley collects such objects. Presence detected in the New Conglomerate embassy on Sanctuary.
Increases the lock-on disruption to 8 seconds.
Increases the lock on range of the missile launcher by 10 meters.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 27.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 1013 rounds.
Adds red chassis lights to the under carriage of the Flash. TR use only.
Terrify your enemies with this Demonic Horn. All factions can use this gear.

Allows the Prowler to deploy which increases the reload speed of the primary weapon by 36% and projectile speed by 30% but the Prowler is unable to move. The Prowler must not be moving to engage deployment.
The Illuminated Skull Helmet causes terror in those unfortunate enough to oppose its wearer. NC use only.
Allows cortium to be used to create a module that, when powered, renders nearby structures nearly indestructible thanks to lightning-fast repairs. VS use only.
State-of-the-art air conditioning in Nanite Systems' perpetually burning skull helmet keeps it both looking and feeling cool. Provides a +15% xp bonus when worn during the annual Halloween Event.
Improve cruising speed, vertical thrust, and roll rate.
Apply the Cells camo pattern to your armor. TR use only.
<font color="#00FFAA">Foster:</font> It's hard to imagine a civilization capable of such technological marvels. Makes one ponder who or what drove the previous inhabitants away.
Increases the time required for seeking weapons to establish a lock by 1.5 seconds, prevents the vehicle being auto detected on the mini-map and blocks enemy Engagement Radars.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 180 rounds.
Applies a decal to your vehicle. TR use only.
The Focused Plasma Cannon Tank Destroyer is a high damage cannon that is used by the Vanu Sovereignty against enemy tanks
Apply the Wave camo pattern to your armor. VS use only.
Customize your Flash with this green antenna ball. NC use only.
Only authorized members can enlist your Outfit.
Increases the reserve ammo of your rocklet rifle by 3 magazines, and holstered rocklet rifles will auto-reload every 8 seconds.
Rapidly regenerating capacitor lowers time between abilities in exchange for less armor
Increases the vertical thrust speed of the Liberator by 15KPH.
Increases the top speed of the Liberator by 10 KPH.
NS35 Frag Cannon Right Copper Medal
Allows use of the mid-range 3.4x HDS scope.
This nose-mounted mining turret can harvest cortium from long range.
Applies a banner to your character. VS use only.
Explosive detected on shield control generator.
[*target*] is part of a different faction.
Unlock defense slot Certifications to increase the Sunderer's survivability on the field. Defense slot items can be equipped on the loadout screen.
Allows the Prowler to deploy which increases the reload and projectile speed of the primary weapon, but the Prowler is unable to move.
A terminal control generator is back online.
The Quad Cannon description goes here. blah blah blah blah [TBD]
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.3 seconds.
Click the green resupply button on the left side of the terminal menu to equip your selected loadout and resupply all of your ammunition.

Sabot Rocklets sacrifice damage for increased accuracy at range. When equipped, alternate fire is replaced with a low-bloom 3-round burst, and projectile velocity is increased for both firemodes.

Purchasing this item with Daybreak Cash will only unlock it for the faction it was purchased on.
Decreases the time needed to reload weapon by 8.75%
This training area has both friendly and hostile targets intermingled to help you learn target recognition.
Applies a decal to your vehicle. VS use only.
The supercooled coil allows the sniper to prepare another round while aiming down sights.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.12 seconds.
While active, a barrier forms around the ANT, reducing incoming damage by 30% to the top, sides, front, and rear of the vehicle. Drains 40 Cortium per second.
Lightnings and Main Battle Tanks cost 30% less nanites when pulled from this facility.
Increases the roll rate of the Reaver by 12 degrees/second.
Find and Join a Contested Battle
True mastery of the Liberator requires skill as both as a pilot a gunner in its many ground support roles.
Unlock mobility boosting Certifications for the Liberator's performance slot. Performance slot items can be equipped on the loadout screen.
Increases the power of the Nanite Proximity Repair System by 100%.
Apply the single use California Scrub camo pattern to your vehicle. VS use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
Increases the Idle Timer on the Harasser to 9 minutes.
Reduces damage taken from small arms, heavy machine guns, and gatling guns by 20%.
Foster can be found on the Observation Deck in Sanctuary.
Reduces the amount of damage received from explosions by 50%
Increases the Afterburner Fuel capacity by 75%.
You are not the platoon leader.

<font color="#00FFAA">Narrator Drone:</font> Ever since being assigned to Sanctuary, Representative Nalla of Nascent Expeditions has been silently yearning to return planetside and feel the rumble of heavy machinery beneath her feet.
The Skull Helmet causes terror in those unfortunate enough to oppose its wearer. NC use only.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.2 seconds.
NC: Vehicle - Customization - Snake Decal Promo
Zealot Overdrive has been removed from your MAX and its cert cost refunded.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.2 seconds.
Creates a shield that protects against aerial bombardment, but does not have vehicle or player collision. VS only.
Applies a decal to your vehicle. NC use only.
The semi-automatic AMR-66 battle rifle uses powerful cartridges that hold considerable stopping power up to medium range. TR use only.
Increases the number of restoration kits that can be carried to 3.
Adds Lumifiber Trim to the Flash. All factions can use this gear.
Increases the ammo capacity of the weapon to 1185 rounds.

Creates a nanite field that regenerates shields in a 5 meter radius. Each cert rank increases the regeneration rate.

Using Ablity will equip the deployable.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 1000 rounds.
Decreases the time needed to reload weapon by 7.5%
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 788 rounds.
Apply the Temperate Forest camo pattern to your weapon. All factions can use this gear.
Flak Armor provides improved protection from nearby explosions
Earned by being the Harasser driver when a passenger kills an enemy.
Customize your soldier's voice with this Roughneck Voice Pack. TR Male use only.

BASTION COMPONENT
Recharges life support and calibrates navigation systems.
Requires Bastion Asset crafting permissions.

Required to summon Bastion Fleet Carrier.
Apply the single use Amerish Forest v2 camo pattern to your armor. NC use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
Reduces the acquire timer of the Lightning by 360 seconds.
Unlock mobility boosting Certifications for the Reaver's performance slot. Performance slot items can be equipped on the loadout screen.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.45 seconds.
Warden Hadley is located on the Observation Deck in Sanctuary.
The EMP Spiker damages enemy shields and disrupts enemy Infiltrator's cloaking devices.
Adds 6 rockets to the default magazine size.
Unlocks access to Scout Rifles. Light Assault only.
Allows cortium to be used to create a tower structure that can be used by infantry units.
Composite armor increases the Liberators base resistance to flak, light tank rounds and heavy tank rounds by 8, 15, and 20% respectively.
Reload all infantry weapons faster for 2 hours. Rank 15 required.
Unlock various gadgets for the Magrider's Utility slot. Utility slot items can be equipped on the loadout screen.
Reduces the movement speed penalty for crouching by 40%.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.6 seconds.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 16 grenades.
Seek and destroy pumpkins on Amerish
Demonstrate strength and loyalty through sound! This horn plays portions of the Terran Republic faction theme.
The E540 Halberd fires 85 mm armor-piercing rockets. NC use only.
The Corvus VA55 features low recoil and high accuracy over sustained fire, making it a popular choice for long range engagements. VS use only.
Contains five implants with a chance of getting T2 implants! Nanite Systems unfortunately can only deliver implants to one character due to technical limitations.

Shortly after being thrown, this Nanite Healing Grenade creates a temporary Nano-Regen field that quickly mends injured soldiers.

Lasts for 10 seconds.
Ambusher Jump Jets provide a quick burst of forward thrust, with limited vertical height and a 7 second cooldown between uses.
This customization adds a Brown decal to the cockpit glass. NC use only.

Reduces damage taken from small arms, and heavy machine guns, gatling guns, aircraft machineguns, anti-aircraft machineguns, and anti-materiel rifles by 20%. <font color="#dc9c36">Reduces base movement speed by 10%.</font>
Allows squad leaders to request empire-wide offensive and defensive support by placing markers on the continent map.
Reduces the acquire timer of the Sunderer by 270 seconds.
Unlock the Digital camo pattern for your armor, weapons and vehicles. VS use only.
The Adrenaline Pump increases sprint speed while equipped.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 40 missiles.

<font color="#00FFAA">Nalla:</font> Individual assignments are being handled by Coordinator Tolland who is no doubt enjoying his new position on the Operations Deck above. I'd recommend speaking to him before going out and getting your hands dirty.
Social: Get 100 kills while grouped with a friend
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 490 rounds.
This customization adds a Tiger Face decal to the cockpit glass. All factions can use this gear.

Trades 50 Auraxium for 4 Synthium.

Uses resources in the Outfit Armory.
Nanites constantly repair damage over time at a rate of 4.64% every 5 seconds. Damage disables auto repair for 12 seconds.

Generates a decaying shield of nanites 6 meters around the soldier that mitigates 25% damage to nearby allies for up to 7.2 seconds. Damage taken does not cause this shield to drain more quickly.

This item expires at the end of the Campaign.
Auraxis Firearms' latest SMG is the AF-12 Tempest. Its high rate of fire can shred through infantry at close ranges.

This short-fuse version of the standard Flash Grenade will temporarily blind and deafen infantry targets, but do so with less effectiveness as the original.

1.5 second fuse.
Increases the amount of rockets carried
If you are in a platoon, other squads of the platoon also show up in their corresponding squad's color.

Cloaks the infiltrator for up to 6.5 seconds. Sprint speed is increased by 20% and falling damage is reduced while cloaked. Recharges in 13 seconds.

VS Infiltrator Ability. This item expires at the end of the Campaign.
You must be leading a Squad or Platoon to issue orders.
Use the NE-11 PLE to harvest Elysium Crystals near geysers on Esamir. Equipping the Tempest Shield will mitigate the radiation damage emitted from the geyser.
The suits should cut you a bonus check.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 42 rounds.
Small explosive device that is projected by the user.
Collect samples of new plant life scattered around The Shattered Warpgate. The Analysis HUD implant will highlight nearby plants.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 360.
Only leaders of squads or platoons with more than 2 members can issue situation reports..
Adds cosmetic tires to the Harasser. All factions can use this gear.
Increases the rotation speed of the Vanguard by 3 degrees/second.
Attaches custom fins to the Scythe.

A festive purple cap woven with Auraxium fibers.
+50% xp when worn
This item is only usable during the winter holiday season.
The middle rank of the skull decal. All factions can use this gear.
Search the abandoned Amp Stations on Esamir to recover a Stormglider Drone.
Apply the single use Giraffe camo pattern to your vehicle. VS use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
<font color="#7FF4FF">/report </font> - Opens a window that can be used to report another player's bad behavior.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 3 rounds.

Each time you are revived, a charge is added to the phylactery. At 3 charges, your next death will allow you to self-revive once at 50% health. Phylactery's self-revive does not count toward these charges. <font color="#dc9c36">Charges cannot be gained while in a vehicle, and redeploying or using an equipment terminal will wipe your current progress. MAXes can use this implant.</font>
Complete Combat Medic and Engineer Expert Tier Directives
Complete Meltdown Alerts on Oshur with at least 50% participation.
Aircraft: Kill 50 infantry using the galaxy gunner pods
They enemy has taken a control node!
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.6 seconds.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 160 rockets.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 180 rounds.
Victory Over Internet Protocol Vehicle Decal
<font color="#00FFAA">Hadley</font> Anyway, we need the little glowing cores out of the center of these plants, but the skin is pretty thick. Gotta use your knife. You're good at that, right?
Increases the time required for seeking weapons to establish a lock by 0.25 seconds and reduces the mini-map auto-detect range of the vehicle to 75 meters.
<font color="#00FFAA">Dolan:</font> The Vanu were an ancient race with technology bordering on magic, and the device at the center of the crater is what we refer to as a World Anchor.
Increases the lifespan of the Ammunition Pack to 6 minutes; also increases the radius in which the pack will resupply ammo to 7 meters.
Cannot set destination out of bounds
Killing an enemy will recharge the Adrenaline Shield's capacitor by 41%.
Biological resources can be used to...
When engaged, the afterburner burns fuel to increase the Liberator's top speed. An empty fuel tank regenerates in 40 seconds.
Applies a decal to your armor. NC use only.
Apply the Abstract camo pattern to your vehicle. VS use only.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 9.375%
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 1000 rounds.
Killing an enemy soldier increases cloak charge by 10%.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 420 rounds.
You are awarded resources for holding territory for the Terran Republic.
<font color="#00FFAA">Knightly:</font> That was solid detective work you did out there, soldier. Perhaps not as action-packed as you're used to, but valuable none-the-less.
Uses the MAX's fully charged capacitor to temporarily supercharge their movement servos, allowing the user to mount an assault or quickly dash to cover
Revenge is sweet, but why stop there? TR use only.

This training program will take about 10 minutes to complete. It covers the following topics: - Movement - Capturing facilities - Resupplying - Changing classes - Using weapons and equipment - Redeploying - Changing continents - Getting into the action
Adds cosmetic plating to your Vanguard. NC use only.
The Rebel's Skull Helmet causes terror in those unfortunate enough to oppose its wearer. NC use only.

The treaties may have permitted the empires to establish footholds on Oshur without firing a single shot, but everyone knows that the carnage started two minutes after. With the battle for Oshur now fully underway, it's time to move to the front lines and fight for the Terran Republic!
Fitted with 3.4x magnification, the Ax3 optic excels at mid-range target acquisition.
Heavy Rail Beam Double Loader Ability
The Twin 120mm Artillery Cannon Tank Destroyer is an indirect firing weapon that is capable of inflicting maximum damage to enemy tanks
Apply the single use Temperate Forest camo pattern to your vehicle. NC use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.

<font color="#00FFAA">Umatherin:</font> But for now, we have the Oshur excursion days from departure and a treatise with the Terran Republic that will deteriorate the moment boots touch sand. Until then, continue aiding Nascent Expeditions with their final preparations.
Grants a 10% boost to resource and XP gain
Increases experience gain by 50% for 1 day. Boost can only be used on this character.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 420 rounds.

<font color="#00FFAA">Facilitator Campner:</font> Greetings, operative. You displayed masterful use of the ANT. I have been told that it once was used to transport resources across the battlefield to power bases. Perhaps it will again. Initiating payment now.
I am in need of repair.
Ammunition Package. Deploy this to resupply ammunition for your team.
Further increases the strength of Nanoweave Armor.
Combat Medics are high priority targets; they can revive the fallen and turn the tides of a fight. Take them out quickly!
Allows soldiers to carry 3 additional magazines for both their primary and sidearm weapons.
Applies a decal to your vehicle. All factions can use this gear.
Adds 3 rounds to the default magazine size.
Customize your ground vehicle by adding a Moustache Hood Ornament.
Cloaks users who remain stationary for a time.
The video capture system exceeded its memory limit.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 315 rounds.
The T1S features a shorter barrel than the standard Cycler, giving it better performance in close-quarters combat.
Allows soldiers to carry 3 additional magazines for both their primary and sidearm weapons.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 1 second.

<font color="#00FFAA">Campner:</font> In addition, you were instrumental in our efforts to scout the new Containment Sites, were able to mine a large quantity of resources to aid in their construction, and spearheaded efforts to make the storm a tool instead of a hinderance.
Save the fight for the enemy!

Designed to combat the Indar heat, the Soldier Soaker was an inconvenient, yet familiar way to cool off soldiers in need.

Limited event item.
The video capture system encountered a bad file. (Could not read)

The G40-F Ranger is an air deterrent flak cannon. It has a high elevation range and launches 40mm flak rounds that burst when near enemy aircraft. NC use only.
Increases the Idle Timer on the Lightning to 7 minutes.
A high density particle field that helps protect the user from injury. The shield will regenerate over time if not receiving damage.
Customize your Galaxy with these sleek Razor Fins. NC use only.
Improves thruster efficiency, increasing total air time by 11 seconds.
Further increases the Infiltrator's Control Console hacking speed.
Nanoweave Armor has been removed from your Light Assault and its cert cost refunded.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 29 rockets.
Apply the Ortho Digital camo pattern to your armor. VS use only.
The G30 Walker is a heavy machine gun with a high elevation range and soft point ammunition designed to be more effective against aircraft. NC use only.
The P525 Marauder fires 40mm high explosive grenades that are effective against infantry and light armor. TR use only.
Apply the Diced camo pattern to your vehicle. NC use only.
A spawn control unit is back online.
Single Use Forest Greyscale Vehicle Camo
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 6 shots.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 38 rounds.
Increases the power of the Nanite Proximity Repair System by 300%.
